title: Sauce Tureen And Lid, 1760s–80s
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Shaped ovoid tureen on three feet; stepped, domed cover with central knop; green and ochre decoration of birds, flowers and foliage.

tombstone.epitaph: Sauce Tureen And Lid, 1760s–80s. Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-10-a,b.
